articles.author: Carrie McCabe
articles.title: Amazon Cyber Monday deals still available to shop: The best final sales from Apple, Dyson, PlayStation and more are up to 70% off - Yahoo
articles.description: The best Amazon sales will save you major bucks on everything from tech upgrades to holiday gift-worthy goodies.
articles.content: Didn't get a chance to take advantage of all the Black Friday and Cyber Monday deals because you were on vacation and, well, having too much fun? Awesome! But now it's Tuesday and what better way to … [+1925 chars]

articles.author: Connie Loizos
articles.title: Apple just named a new AI chief with Google and Microsoft expertise, as John Giannandrea steps down - TechCrunch
articles.description: His replacement is Amar Subramanya, a highly regarded Microsoft executive who spent 16 years at Google, most recently leading engineering for the Gemini Assistant. It's a savvy hire, given that Subramanya knows the competition intimately.
articles.content: In a carefully worded announcement on Monday, Apple said John Giannandrea, who has been the company’s AI chief since 2018, is “stepping down” to, well, not work at Apple anymore. He’ll stick around t… [+3880 chars]
